messages.msgSnippet: Kelly writes: He hasn t taken it off except to sleep!  Gillian s husband spent the day with him. He wore it today to the grocery and to K-mart. Patrick says
messages.messageBody:
Kelly writes:

He hasn't taken it
off except to sleep! <G> Gillian's husband spent the day with him. He
wore it
today to the grocery and to K-mart. Patrick says that Duncan was
oblivious,
but
that every child who saw him was SOOO envious! Eyes like saucers!



I would have loved to seen this!! Too Cute!!!! Oh yeah, thanks for
the pattern description too. I think I'll look at the book Pam
suggested first though since I really haven't made anything for years
and I'm kinda getting lazy in my old age and use any shortcut I can!!!
Kimberly
